translation.variant: Entrada binaria de micro bloque personalizado
Entrada analógica de micro bloque personalizado
Salida analógica de micro bloque personalizado
Salida binaria de micro bloque personalizado

translation.note: an arc figure (part of a circle)
an ellipse figure
line figure
Point figure (just a dot)
Polygon figure
rectangle figure
conditional figure
Image figure
text figure
label with the input on the left side.
label with the input on the right side.
The name shown to add a wire
unique name for each object
Whether or not a label is an input vs an output
This is a header for the field to edit a label's text
Header for figure foreground color
Header for figure background color
Header for whether or not a figure has a transparent background color
Header for text font
Header for text font size
Header for text font style
Header for normal text direction ( horizontal )
Header for vertical text direction
Header for text direction that is ascending ( climbing from left to right )
Header for text direction that is descending ( going down from left to right )
Text for undo/redo when a single label is renamed. Note: The dual single quotes below must be preserved.
translation.variant: Cambiar nombre de una etiqueta de ''{0}'' a ''{1}''

translation.note: Text for undo/redo when multiple labels are renamed. Note: The dual single quotes below must be preserved.
translation.variant: Cambiar nombre de múltiples etiquetas de ''{0}'' a ''{1}''

translation.note: Undo list message for setting the color values of selected figures
The name of a new control program that has not been saved yet. [Untitled X].
short description of a single microblock. The first parameter is for the short name. The second is the type. There's nothing here to translate.
Short description of a single label. The first argument is the name. The second is whether or not its an input or an output
Short description of a wire. The argument is the type (analog or binary).
Description shown for undo/redo when a symbol is imported.
Description shown for undo/redo when something is pasted.
Description shown for undo/redo when a favorite something is inserted.
Short description of a receptacle. This version includes input/ouput, the type, the name, and its index
Short description of a receptacle. This version includes input/ouput, the type, (NO NAME) and its index
description of something that is an input vs an output.
description of something that is an output vs an input.
The name of the default value set. It cannot be renamed (by the user) and must always exist. This is basically the baseline values that must always be present.
status message notifying the user that the symbol was successfully saved and where it was saved.
status message notifying the user that the control was successfully saved and where it was saved.
translation.variant: Programa de control guardado correctamente en ''{0}''

translation.note: status message notifying the user that the control program was successfully compiled to an equipment file and where it was saved.
This is for a microblock that we read in and do not know what type it is. This is for forward compatibility so current versions can at least open files created by future version of the application.
message that 1 item has been added.
"added x items." message for when multiple (or no) items have been added (just not 1). where x is the number of items added.
"Delete point (x,y)" where x and y are the coordinates of the point deleted.

translation.variant: Las figuras no se han implementado aún.
Cambie el color de la línea.

translation.note: "Deleted x items." where x is the number of items deleted. This is for deleting multiple or no items (just not 1).
"message that mulitple things were moved
"message that a microblock was moved
"message that a label was moved
"message that a figure was moved
"message that a wire was moved
"New point (x,y)." message that a new point was created at x,y coordinates.

translation.variant: El código se encuentra en el portapapeles.
El nombre de referencia ''{0}'' es demasiado largo. Los nombres de referencia sólo pueden tener {1} caracteres.
El nombre de referencia ''{0}'' se usa varias veces. Los nombres de referencia deben ser únicos.
La duración ''{0}'' no es válida. La duración sólo puede contener dígitos numéricos.
Un nombre de referencia no puede comenzar con un número.
Un nombre de referencia sólo puede contener letras, dígitos y caracteres de subrayado, y no puede comenzar con un número.
El nombre de referencia ''{0}'' está reservado y no se puede utilizar.
Este micro bloque no está permitido en programas de control con esta clasificación de equipo.
El microbloque [{0}] no está admitido en esta clasificación de equipo.
Uno o varios parámetros no se han cerrado correctamente.
Se produjo un error desconocido de compilación interna. El archivo no podrá adjuntarse en SiteBuilder.
No se han podido recuperar los valores de simulación.
No se han podido actualizar los valores de simulación.

translation.note: Generic error message when a file is not valid.

translation.variant: No se ha podido crear el archivo. No se ha podido guardar el archivo.
Se produjo un error desconocido al intentar escribir el archivo.
No se ha podido crear la imagen de vista previa.
No se ha podido crear el icono del equipo.

translation.note: this is for a list of images but the user can chose nothing. If they do, we display [none specified]

translation.variant: No se ha podido leer en la ubicación del micro bloque. Nombre de referencia: {0} ( tipo: {1} )
No se ha podido leer en el tipo de micro bloque desconocido ( {0} ) {1}
No se ha podido guardar el programa ''{0}''
No se ha podido cargar un recurso desconocido
No se ha podido cargar la fuente de datos ''{0}''.
No se ha podido escribir la propiedad del micro bloque ( {0} )
No se ha podido leer en el micro bloque desconocido ( {0} )
No se ha podido leer en el micro bloque ( {0} )
No se ha podido agregar el alambre {0}
No se ha podido leer en un objeto.
No se ha podido escribir el archivo
No se ha podido leer el archivo
No se puede determinar el formato correcto.
Ha fallado la grabación. Consulte {0} para obtener más información.
{0} no es un archivo válido. (No se puede determinar el tipo de archivo)

translation.note: error message when we can't determine what type of file this is so we can't read it in.
translation.variant: Formato no válido. No se puede determinar el tipo.
Se produjo un error al intentar escribir un archivo de error. No se pudo generar ningún archivo de error
Es posible que haya demasiados micro bloques del tipo ''{0}'' ( {1} )
Este campo no puede dejarse en blanco
El valor debe estar entre {0} y {1}
{0} no es un número real válido.
{0} no es un entero sin signo válido.

translation.note: Error that will say 'failed to read location of [input/output label] [name].
translation.variant: No se ha podido leer la ubicación de {0} ''{1}''.

translation.note: Generic error meaning the user tried to open a file that doesn't exist. It will be followed by a newline and the file pathInstance.
translation.variant: No se ha encontrado el archivo.
Este valor no es válido. Este valor puede ser "verdadero" o "falso".
Este valor no es válido. Debe ser '1' o '0'.

translation.note: Generic error meaning the user tried to simulate a control program and an unspecified error occurred.
translation.variant: No se ha podido realizar la simulación.
{0} no es una dirección URL válida.
{0} no es un valor de plantilla válido. Entre los caracteres válidos se incluyen letras, números o guiones bajos "_". Los nombres de plantilla deben comenzar con una letra.

translation.note: the name field on the edit order list. Shows the name of the microblock. This is not editable.
the description field on the edit order list. Shows the description of the microblock (if it has one). This is not editable.
the reference name field on the edit order list. Shows the reference name of the microblock. This is not editable.
the property page text field on the edit order list. Shows the property page text of the microblock if is has a field (may be blank). This is not editable.
Label for OCL programming language text.
Label for active text.
Label for inactive text.
Label abbreviation for Name Override
Error message that occurs when an image fails to load
translation.variant: No se ha podido leer en la imagen:

translation.note: Error message to notify the user that embedded images are not supported.
translation.variant: El archivo contiene imágenes incrustadas que no son compatibles con esta versión.

translation.note: Error message to notify that the property for the supplied path wasn't found.
Heading for dialog to notify the user that their document is printing.
Error message thrown when a signed file fails validation.
translation.variant: El archivo no es válido. Su firma no es válida.

translation.note: Error message thrown when a signed file has missing signatures.
translation.variant: Este archivo no es válido. Faltan sus firmas.

translation.note: Error thrown when the simulator detects an error during run time.
translation.variant: Se ha producido un error irrecuperable durante la simulación.

translation.note: Tooltip that appears when the cursor hovers over the button to run the simulation.
translation.variant: Ejecuta la simulación a través de intervalos de tiempo predeterminados.

translation.note: Tooltip that appears when the cursor hovers over the button to step the simulation through one execution cycle.
translation.variant: Administra la simulación mediante un único ciclo de ejecución.

translation.note: Tooltip that appears when the cursor hovers over the button to stop a running simulation.
translation.variant: Detiene una simulación que se está ejecutando.

translation.note: Warning to the user informing them why a file name they selected (when they tried to save a control program) is empty and thus illegal. They didn't really pick a name.
Warning to the user informing them why a file name they selected (when they tried to save a control program) is too long and thus illegal.
translation.variant: Los nombres de archivo no pueden exceder de {0} caracteres

translation.note: Warning to the user informing them why a file name they selected (when they tried to save a control program) is invalid.
translation.variant: Los nombres de archivo sólo pueden contener caracteres alfanuméricos, guiones y caracteres de subrayado (sin espacios), y no pueden comenzar con un número.

translation.note: File description for plugins that only shows up in the file chooser dialog.
Error message for failing to convert a property from one type to another ( i.e. from bit '0','1' to boolean 'true','false' )
translation.variant: No se ha podido convertir el tipo

translation.note: Generic error message where the problem is not known.
Error message that occurs when the conversion table is out of sync with the definitions.
translation.variant: Error interno. Es posible que la definición no esté sincronizada con la información de conversión.

translation.note: Error message generated when we try to read in a property that is undefined.
translation.variant: No se ha podido leer la propiedad desconocida de {0} ( {1} )

translation.note: Error message generated if we try to fill a figure with an unknown fill pattern.
Error message generated when an unknown font name if found.
translation.variant: No existe ninguna fuente con el nombre {0}

translation.note: Error message generated when a bad color is found
Error message generated when a bad font stle is found
Error message generated when an illegal font size for a font is found.
translation.variant: {0} no es un tamaño de fuente válido para esta fuente

translation.note: Error message generated when an illegal line type is found.
Message generated whenever the background transparency is modified.
Message generated when an invalid wire type is found.
translation.variant: El tipo de alambre no es válido

translation.note: Message seen in undo list that shows a microblock property has changed values.
translation.variant: Cambió la propiedad ''{1}' en el microbloque ({0}) de ''{2}'' a ''{3}''

translation.note: Error message generated when we save the source, but could not compile it during the save.
translation.variant: Error interno. No se ha podido generar el equipo. El archivo de origen NO está dañado a menos que se produzcan otros errores.

translation.note: Error message generated when we read in a file but can't find the file version information
translation.variant: No se puede determinar la versión del archivo.

translation.note: Error message generated when we try to read in a property that is undefined.
Error message generated when we try to read in properties and they could not be read correctly.
translation.variant: Las siguientes propiedades no se han leído correctamente {0}: {1}

translation.note: Error message generated when the user ( or program ) tries to place a microblock in an illegal location.
translation.variant: Causa probable: {0} no permite micro bloques sobre otros micro bloques o extremos de alambre/etiqueta. EIKON para WebCTRL solía permitirlos, pero en ocasiones esto hacía que se ocultaran conexiones involuntariamente, lo que dificultaba la localización y, en algunos casos, daba lugar a un comportamiento inesperado. Pulse el botón Corregir para volver a colocarlo.

translation.note: Message displayed when an error has been fixed
This is a partial message generated when an attempt is made to set a property to an illegal value.
This is a partial message generated when an attempt is made to set a property to an illegal value.
Message displayed for a search and replace.
Message displayed when a wire changes type, for example from analog to binary.
Error message for a bad property value. Not really meant for the end user to see.
Error message for an OCL microblock that has had too many inputs created.
translation.variant: Se han definido demasiado entradas. El número máximo de entradas permitido es 16.

translation.note: Error message for an invalid character in a label.
translation.variant: '{0}' en índice {1} no es un carácter válido para etiquetas.

translation.note: Message displayed when a bad time value is found. It either has illegal characters or an incorrect format.
Message displayed when an error has no detailed information to display.
translation.variant: No existen detalles para este error.

translation.note: Message for an option to show typical or common properties on graphics.
translation.variant: Mostrar propiedades que se muestran normalmente en los gráficos.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but having more microblocks than are allowed. It says what the max is and how many you've exceeded it by some amount. It also points out that not all types of microblocks are included in the count.
translation.variant: Un programa de control ZN admite como máximo {0} micro bloques (sin incluir etiquetas, texto, micro bloques estado y micro bloques de E/S dentro de micro bloques personalizados). Este programa de control supera el máximo en {1} micro bloques.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but having a microblocks that is not allowed.
translation.variant: El microbloque {0} no se admite en el equipo ZN.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but not having the required microblocks.
translation.variant: Faltan microbloques necesarios para el ZN. El ZN requiere un reloj de hora BACnet, un setpoint y un sensor de zona RS o Logistat, o una entrada con el nombre "temperatura de zona".

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but having too many PID microblocks.
translation.variant: Hay demasiados micro bloques de bucles PID. Los módulos ZN sólo pueden contener {0}

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but having too many Set Color.
translation.variant: Hay demasiados micro bloques de color establecidos. Los módulos ZN sólo pueden contener {0}

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but having microblocks outside the allowed bounds.
translation.variant: Los micro bloques necesarios deben tener entre ({0}, {1}) y ({2}, {3}) límites para ZN.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but not having the required microblocks.
translation.variant: Falta la entrada necesaria para el setpoint. La entrada "zona" del setpoint debe ser o una entrada analógica, una entrada analógica de red, un sensor de zona Logistat, un sensor de zona RS (con o sin control de ventilador) o una etiqueta con el nombre 'temperatura de zona'. Si la entrada proviene de Logistat, debe estar asociada a la salida "temperatura de zona". Si la entrada proviene de un sensor RS o RSF, debe estar asociada a la salida "zona".

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for ZN, but not having the required microblocks.
translation.variant: Faltan micro bloques necesarios para UNI. UNI requiere un reloj de hora BACnet y un valor propuesto.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for UNI, but having a microblocks that is not allowed.
translation.variant: El microbloque {0} no se admite en el equipo UNI.

translation.note: Error message displayed when trying to compile the control program for UNI, but having a microblocks that is not allowed.
translation.variant: Todos los {0} micro bloques deben estar conectados a la salida del punto de ajuste {1} para UNI.

translation.note: Error message displayed when an image could not be loaded because the image file wasn't found.
translation.variant: No se ha podido leer ''{0}'' debido a que no se encuentra la imagen o está dañada.

translation.note: Default label name for a new label.
Label when general comments when present (and optional) for something in a list. The item will be displayed. If it has comments, this text will be shown followed by the comments.
Error messages stating that a specific microblock has at least 1 property that is in error.
translation.variant: Existen errores de propiedad para el micro bloque ''{0}''

translation.note: Description of image files in the 'file type' combo box of a file chooser dialog
This is displayed if the user adds or renames a Program Defaults (value set) name so its blank (or just whitespace).
translation.variant: Los nombres predeterminados del programa no pueden dejarse en blanco.

translation.note: This is displayed if the user adds or renames a Program Defaults (value set) name that has too many characters. The parameter here is for the maximum number of characters
translation.variant: Los nombres predeterminados del programa pueden tener {0} caracteres como máximo.

translation.note: This is displayed if the user tries to open a file containing (or other operations using) an unsupported microblocks.
General error message for a control program that is not supported in this version/brand of LogicBuilder.

These are details to an error. It specifies that the control program that was attempted to be opened contains multiple 'program defaults'. This features is not supported in this version/brand of LogicBuilder -- which doesn't even present the user with the feature.
translation.variant: Contiene varios valores predeterminados del programa. Esta función no se admite.

translation.note: This is the description for files that are created by the Third Party BACnet Utility. This shows up in File dialogs when a user tries to select a file.
translation.variant: Archivos de utilidades BACnet de terceros

translation.note: This is the description for files that contain information about BACnet objects. This file is generated by WebCTRL and imported by the Third Party BACnet Utility. This shows up in File dialogs when a user tries to select a file.
